_xResult.title: Pink Pencil Perfection
_xResult.longdesc:
Ever dream of looking as royal as Meghan Markle but without breaking the bank? Our favorite daily luxury dressmaker TAVROVSKA has created a gorgeous dress that even the curviest women can rock. The color is rich and pairs well with simple accessories for a sophisticated elegance.

- Extraordinary cowl neckline (wear off shoulder or as a bateau neckline)
- Pencil silhouette
- Blouson top
- Kimono sleeves
- Knee length (midi)

Perfect as party, modest bridesmaid or elegant office dress. Use the box for Customizations below to request any changes to length or special fit notes.


Color: deep pink
Fiber: jersey - viscose - 95%, elastane - 5%
For Size S (8 US): dress length – 40" (104 cm)

properties.propvalue: Hand wash is best, or delicate cycle cold machine wash
